title: Bug 17176java outliner  decorator clash for synchronized and override/implement
description: Bug 17176java outlinerdecorator clash for synchronized and override/implement
OB: F1 linuxgtk, but assume that this happens on all platforms.Either the decorators are on top of each other or it's a single decorator whichis not very recognizable.Also, the override/implements icon looks ugly when the item is selected.
EB: Theborder color should not be white. It should be more like the public icon, whichlooks good both on bright and dark background.
